messages.title: AN ELECTION THAT IS NOT IN THE NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: This election has been called by Mrs May to get a big majority because Parliament might otherwise refuse to agree to a seriously damaging outcome to the Brexit negotiations.

issues.brexitEurope: This election has been called by Mrs May to get a big majority because Parliament might otherwise refuse to agree to a seriously damaging outcome to the Brexit negotiations. At any time it would be contemptible. When the country faces the enormous challenges of Brexit it is inexcusable.
issues.governance: This is the kind of cynical game-playing which has got politicians a bad name.

contactInformation.address: 20 St Andrews Close, Burton on the Wolds, LE12 5TJ.

images.caption: David Walker Your Liberal Democrat Candidate

leaflet.additionalNotes: Published and promoted by Ian Sharpe on behalf of David Walker, Liberal Democrat, all at 20 St Andrews Close, Burton on the Wolds, LE12 5TJ. Printed by Automedia Limited, Prince William Road, Belton Road Industrial Park, Loughborough, Leicestershire, LE11 5GU.
